alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 2:12PM CDT until May 05 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Little River near Tecumseh affecting Seminole and Pottawatomie Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC125-133-050715- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.W.0003.220505T0503Z-220505T1856Z/ /TCMO2.1.ER.220505T0503Z.220505T0600Z.220505T1256Z.NO/ 212 PM CDT Wed May 4 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Tecumseh. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Low-lying croplands... pastures... and rural roads may experience shallow flooding or be isolated by deeper water in overflow channels cutting across the flood plain. The area affected is entirely rural... and downstream of Lake Thunderbird... from near Macomb in Pottawatomie County to near Bowlegs in western Seminole County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
